Package com.concordia.soen6441riskgame

Class RGGameCheater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGameCheater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RGStrategy, java.io.Serializable
    public class RGGameCheater
extends java.lang.Object
implements RGStrategy, java.io.Serializable
    Class to control the game for players with a cheater strategy. Only one game is possible during runtime
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julian Beltran
